label: MH3900
info_overview: MH3900 automatically detects the indoor temperature and display the relevant temperature value for heating control. It also can automatically run on/off the heating system according to the temperature differences. The device can be remotely controlled by Z-Wave network.
info_inclusion: Under normal working interface, long press S1+S3 to enter in Z-Wave Inclusion/Exclusion interface, interface shows "---" which means the device is not included in the network). Short press s2, the device enter into learning mode, after learning mode is completed, the device shows Node ID.
info_exclusion: Under normal working interface, long press S1+S3 to enter in Z-Wave Inclusion/Exclusion interface, interface shows the current Node ID. Short press s2, after some time the node ID will be released and the device will show " ---" again.

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.

notices: Endpoint 0 has no command class linked to the basic class.
